answers.answer: use the search feature and archives and read about "floaters" it may be one. Since you're diabetic you should have an ophthalmologist Eye MD that you see yearly. Go it to see him/her and discuss.JCH MD

question: I am a 61 yr old female with type 2 diabetes.  A couple of days ago, I thought I had trash in my eye, but it didn't hurt and I can't remove it.  It is in my right eye, just to the upper right of my sight. It also appears to have something resembling a hair attached and it is on the bottom left running toward the middle of my sight.Is this something I need to address quickly?Thank you;Ann Emory
title: Odd vision
